short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can save stories from Instagram with just a few clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StorySaver is an extension that allows users to download any story from Instagram with just one click. By installing this extension, you will have access to a toolbar at the top-right corner of your browser. After clicking on the icon, your story will be downloaded immediately.

If you have any questions or concerns about the extension, please contact me at storysaverhd.io@gmail.com and I would be more than happy to help!
